name: Hunter Of The Void
description:
You are hired by a mysterious being known as the void to deal with an extraterrestrial group known as the Space Mafia that has invaded Earth. Your job is to deal with them to save humanity.

There are 5 levels to the game, 4 of them being standard levels with a boss at the end but the fifth level is completely different and is for you to discover what it is.

Credits

https://freesfx.co.uk/ - Where I obtained all the sound effects for the game
